title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.89 - Lakeview Correctional Facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.89 - Lakeview Correctional Facility

State Regulations
(a) There shall be in the department an
institution to be known as Lakeview Correctional Facility, which shall be
located in the Town of Portland, Chautauqua County, New York. (b) Lakeview Correctional Facility shall be a
correctional facility for males 18 years of age or older. (c) Lakeview Correctional Facility shall be
classified as a medium security correctional facility, to be used as a general
confinement and a shock incarceration facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
100.89

Amended

New

York State Register July 22, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
